def_en: Bait is food which you put on a hook or in a trap in order to catch fish or animals.

def_cn: 装饵于；给（鱼钩或陷阱等）上诱饵
def_en: If you bait a hook or trap, you put bait on it or in it.
To use something as bait means to use it to trick or persuade someone to do something.

def_cn: 使上当发火；故意逗…生气
def_en: If you bait someone, you deliberately try to make them angry by teasing them.

def_cn: 中圈套，上当，中计（亦作rise to the bait,主要用于英国英语中）
def_en: If you take the bait, you react to something that someone has said or done exactly as they intended you to do. The expression rise to the bait is also used, mainly in British English.
